description: Using jvm to solve various problems. Ranging from writing mobile, desktop and RESTful apps to coming up with algorithms for autonomous forklift.

software.description: Writing native mobile apps using Java and Kotlin. All of them were communicating with RESTful API. Often there was integration with Google or Facebook services.
One project was a typical RESTful app written in Java, using SpringBoot and Hibernate. Second was a maintenance of a journey planning service making heavy use of GTFS.
Simple internal apps using Swing and JavaFX.

Participating in autonomous forklift project I have opportunity to work on very interesting problems. One of them was safety system, that allows forklift to slow down and then stop, if detected obstacle get closer.
